description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Chuy just can't seem to get it right. He's tried everything to get back to his family. Can you guide him back and help him to avoid the immigration and DEA agents. Guide Chuy through an infinite number of routes back to the border. Gather tacos to summon the Witch, the Goat Sucker and the Boogie Man to scare away and terrorize the immigration agents.
description.short: Chuy just can't seem to get it right. He's tried everything to get back to his family. Can you guide him back and help him to avoid the immigration and DEA agents. Guide Chuy through an infinite number of routes back to the border. Gather tacos to summon the Witch, the Goat Sucker and the Boogie Man to scare away and terrorize the immigration agents.
